metadata.name: Virga #2
metadata.description:
"Virga #2" 

The rain that does not reach the ground. 

An animated loop as a study of an abstracted weather phenomenon known as virga: trails of rain that fall from the underside of a cloud but evaporate or sublime before reaching the earth's surface. 

The arwork was created combining traditional hand-drawing techniques with photon-prendering tools. Only one unique item exists. 

Artwork by Daniel Fi≈°er, 2023.
